price: নিশ্চয় ইয়াত আছে বহুতো নিদৰ্শন; আৰু আমি সিহঁতক পৰীক্ষাহে কৰিছিলোঁ।
arabic: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَٰتٖ وَإِن كُنَّا لَمُبۡتَلِينَ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: inna fī dhālika laāyātin wa-in kunnā lamub'talīna
